languages.text: Whenever the aberrant kills a creature, the aberrant gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, and its {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt is increased by +20%. Stacks.
languages.translation_comment: Бафф Аберрантов, который повышает им WS и исходящий дамаг за каждое убийство

traits.locale_text: Whenever the aberrant kills a creature, the aberrant gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, and its {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt is increased by +20%. Stacks.

languages.text: Whenever the Aberrant kills a creature, the Aberrant gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, and its {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt is increased by +20%. Stacks.
languages.original_text: Aberrant gains +5 Weapon Skill and +10% damage for every creature he kills.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the aberrant kills a creature, the aberrant gains +5 Weapon Skill and its damage dealt is increased by +10%. Stacks.

Whenever the Aberrant kills a creature, the Aberrant gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, and its {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt is increased by +10%. Stacks.

languages.text: Cuando el aberrante mata a una criatura, gana +10 a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} y el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} que inflige aumenta un +20 %. Este efecto es acumulativo.
languages.original_text: Whenever the Aberrant kills a creature, the Aberrant gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, and its {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt is increased by +20%. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el aberrante mata a una criatura, gana +5 a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} y el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} que inflige aumenta un +10 %. Este efecto es acumulativo.

languages.text: アベラントが生物を倒すたび、アベラントは{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器スキル{/g}を+10獲得し、与える{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}は+20%増加する。この効果はスタックする。
languages.original_text: Whenever the Aberrant kills a creature, the Aberrant gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, and its {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt is increased by +20%. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: アベラントが生物を倒すたび、アベラントは{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器スキル{/g}を+5獲得し、与える{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}は+10%増加する。この効果はスタックする。

languages.text: 每当畸变体杀死生物时，畸变体的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}都会提高10点，造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高20%。此效果可叠加。
languages.original_text: Whenever the Aberrant kills a creature, the Aberrant gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, and its {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt is increased by +20%. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: 每当畸变体杀死生物时，畸变体的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}都会提高5点，造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高10%。此效果可叠加。

languages.text: Tötet der Aberrant eine Kreatur, erhält er +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} und sein {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} erhöht sich um +20 %. Stapelbar.
languages.original_text: Whenever the Aberrant kills a creature, the Aberrant gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, and its {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt is increased by +20%. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Tötet der Aberrant eine Kreatur, erhält er +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} und sein {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} erhöht sich um +10 %. Stapelbar.

languages.text: Chaque fois que l'Aberrant tue une créature, il gagne +10 à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Compétence d'arme{/g} et ses {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} sont augmentés de +20 %. Cumulable.
languages.original_text: Whenever the Aberrant kills a creature, the Aberrant gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, and its {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt is increased by +20%. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que l'Aberrant tue une créature, il gagne +5 à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Compétence d'arme{/g} et ses {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} sont augmentés de +10 %. Cumulable.

languages.text: При каждом убийстве цели аберрант получает +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g}, а наносимый им {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} увеличивается на 20%. Эффект суммируется.

traits.locale_text: При каждом убийстве цели аберрант получает +5 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g}, а наносимый им {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} увеличивается на 10%. Эффект суммируется.
